alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 12:07AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caddo and northwestern Bossier Parishes through 1245 AM CDT... At 1206 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plain Dealing, or 19 miles southwest of Springhill, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Benton, Plain Dealing, Mooringsport, Hosston, Belcher, Gilliam, Dixie, Alden Bridge, Rocky Mount, Bolinger, Linton and Cavett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
